vehicles.description: There are multiple vehicles parked on either side of the road.
vehicles.explanation: The presence of parked vehicles narrows the usable road space, which might require the ego car to navigate more cautiously and adjust its path to avoid collisions.

barriers.description: Guardrails are visible on the right-hand side of the road.
barriers.explanation: These guardrails indicate that there is likely a drop or an edge, which emphasizes the need for the ego car to maintain a safe distance and remain on the road.

general_perception.description and explanation: The traffic image shows multiple vehicles parked on either side of the road. This narrows the usable road space, requiring the ego car to navigate more cautiously and adjust its path to avoid collisions. Additionally, guardrails are visible on the right-hand side of the road, indicating a possible drop or edge. This emphasizes the need for the ego car to maintain a safe distance and stay on the road.

driving_suggestion: Given the parked vehicles and potential wet conditions of the road, the ego car should reduce its speed and increase its following distance to account for longer stopping distances. Also, the ego car should use caution to ensure it stays within the navigable roadway, avoiding the guardrails and parked vehicles.
